name: JOEL XMD
description:
Hi there, I am Joel Bot Whatsapp Chuddy Buddy built in NodeJs to make experience better.
	 Incase of Any Problem Whatsapp me on: 255714595078

WELCOME.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable automatic group WELCOME

GOODBYE.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable automatic group GOODBYE

USER_IMAGES.description: Image for Bot. You can Place several Sparated by Commas.

TZ.description: Put TIME_ZONE according to your location

FLUSH.description: Make it 'true' if bot connected but not responding (After deployement!)

WARN_COUNT.description: Warn count for users to kick/block when warn limit exceed!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

WAPRESENCE.description: Fill the value: 'unavailable'(for nothing) | 'available'(for alwaysonline) | 'composing'(for always online and virtual typing) | 'recording'(for always online and virtual recording audio) | 'paused'

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to automatically view your Statuses.

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to show Level Up Messages.

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in Console.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages that is auto blue ticks.

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable bot in pm, Take it false if you wanna run bot in your pm (if MODE is Public)

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

ELEVENLAB_API_KEY.description: Put your ElevenLab api key here for Aitts. Watch tutorial from https://youtu.be/HCDcdPtkwg4

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: put your REMOVE BG KEY here.Get it from removeBg.com

MODE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.
